title: Could not Train the Network

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
OS: Windows 10 OS DeepLabCut Version: DeepLabCut 2.1.8.1 Anaconda env used: DLC-GPU-DC **Describe the problem** I'm trying to run the resnet_50 network on a set of DLC-labeled images of a mouse. After successfully creating the training dataset, I try to train the network for 100000 iterations. Once I click "OK", I get an error of the pose_cfg.yaml file not being found. I'm not sure why, because the file does exist and the path variables have been edited to be correct.
Code output

The training dataset is successfully created. Use the function 'train_network' to start training. Happy training! Traceback (most recent call last): File "/projectnb/hasselmogrp/.conda/envs/DLC-GPU-DC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/gui/train_network.py", line 268, in train_network maxiters=maxiters) File "/projectnb/hasselmogrp/.conda/envs/DLC-GPU-DC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/training.py", line 134, in train_network raise e File "/projectnb/hasselmogrp/.conda/envs/DLC-GPU-DC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/training.py", line 132, in train_network train(str(poseconfigfile),displayiters,saveiters,maxiters,max_to_keep=max_snapshots_to_keep,keepdeconvweights=keepdeconvweights,allow_growth=allow_growth) #pass on path and file name for pose_cfg.yaml! File "/projectnb/hasselmogrp/.conda/envs/DLC-GPU-DC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/train.py", line 111, in train cfg = load_config(config_yaml) File "/projectnb/hasselmogrp/.conda/envs/DLC-GPU-DC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/config.py", line 56, in load_config return cfg_from_file(filename) File "/projectnb/hasselmogrp/.conda/envs/DLC-GPU-DC/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/config.py", line 42, in cfg_from_file with open(filename, 'r') as f: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'pnambiar/dlc/dannenberg1_2710/dlc-models/iteration-0/hdan_vid1Oct27-trainset95shuffle1/train/pose_cfg.yaml'

**How to Reproduce the problem** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Launch DeepLabCut 2. Load already labeled DeepLabCut project 3. Click on "Train Network" 4. Reset Number of Iterations = 10000 5. See error: FileNotFound **Screenshots** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18171814/99158891-c4507a80-26a5-11eb-86af-de89b949c053.png) **Additional context** This project is being executed through a remote connection to a desktop. If the issue cannot be from DLC then, this may be the source.
